job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtPOSITION PURPOSEltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe Software Engineer is responsible for joining an Application Operations team and contributing to the support of overall product lifecycle and standardizing processes for increased efficiency in our Supply Chain Applications This position focuses on handling incident management problem management change management ad hoc requests and knowledge base creationltbrgtltbrgtAs a Software Engineer you will be part of a team with more experienced engineers to help build and grow your skills while you support and improve the efficiency and reliability of the applications you supportltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtMajor Tasks Responsibilities And Key Accountabilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggt60  Delivery ampamp ExecutionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCollaborates and pairs with other product team members UX engineering and product management to create secure reliable scalable software solutionsltbrgtltbrgtWorks with Product Team to ensure user stories that are developerready easy to understand and testableltbrgtltbrgtWrites custom code or scripts to automate infrastructure monitoring services and test casesltbrgtltbrgtWrites custom code or scripts to do destructive testing to ensure adequate resiliency in productionltbrgtltbrgtConfigures commercial off the shelf solutions to align with evolving business needsltbrgtltbrgtCreates meaningful dashboards logging alerting and responses to ensure that issues are captured and addressed proactivelyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt20  Support ampamp EnablementltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtFields questions from other product teams or support teamsltbrgtltbrgtMonitors tools and participates in conversations to encourage collaboration across product teamsltbrgtltbrgtProvides application support for software running in productionltbrgtltbrgtProactively monitors production Service Level Objectives for productsltbrgtltbrgtProactively reviews the Performance and Capacity of all aspects of production code infrastructure data and message processingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt20 LearningltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtParticipates in learning activities around modern software design and development core practices communities of practiceltbrgtltbrgtProactively views articles tutorials and videos to learn about new technologies and best practices being used within other technology organizationsltbrgtltbrgtReviews and discusses code from more senior engineers to understand best practices and design patternsltbrgtltbrgtIncreases business acumen by learning about other parts of the businessltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtNATURE AND SCOPEltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtTypically reports to the Software Engineer Manager or Sr ManagerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEnvironmentltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLocated in a comfortable indoor area Any unpleasant conditions would be infrequent and not objectionableltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtTravelltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtTypically requires overnight travel less than 10 of the timeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtMinimum QualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtMust be eighteen years of age or olderltbrgtltbrgtMust be legally permitted to work in the United StatesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAdditional Minimum QualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtExperience in an object oriented programming language preferably JavaltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEducation RequiredltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe knowledge skills and abilities typically acquired through the completion of a high school diploma andor GEDltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYears of Relevant Work Experience ltstronggt1 yearltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPhysical RequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtMost of the time is spent sitting in a comfortable position and there is frequent opportunity to move about On rare occasions there may be a need to move or lift light articlesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt01 years of relevant work experienceltligtltligtExperience in a modern scripting language preferably PythonltligtltligtExposure to a modern web application framework such as Ruby on Rails Spring MVC and NodejsltligtltligtExposure to a frontend technology and framework such as HTML CSS JavaScript AngularJS ReactJS and JQueryltligtltligtExposure to writing SQL queries against a relational databaseltligtltligtExposure to version control systems preferably GitltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtKnowledge Skills Abilities and CompetenciesltstronggtCultivates Innovation Creating new and better ways for the organization to be successfulltbrgtltulgtltligtCollaborates Building partnerships and working collaboratively with others to meet shared objectivesltligtltligtCommunicates Effectively Developing and delivering multimode communications that convey a clear understanding of the unique needs of different audiencesltligtltligtDrives Results Consistently achieving results even under tough circumstancesltligtltligtGlobal Perspective Taking a broad view when approaching issues using a global lensltligtltligtInterpersonal Savvy Relating openly and comfortably with diverse groups of peopleltligtltligtManages Ambiguity Operating effectively even when things are not certain or the way forward is not clearltligtltligtNimble Learning Actively learning through experimentation when tackling new problems using both successes and failures as learning fodderltligtltligtSelfDevelopment Actively seeking new ways to grow and be challenged using both formal and informal development channelsltligtltligtSituational Adaptability Adapting approach and demeanor in real time to match the shifting demands of different situationsltligtltulgt
